headline: Albemarle Stock Rises. There’s New Hope for Lithium Demand.
summary: It has been tough for lithium producers over the past few years.  On Tuesday, Baird analyst Ben Kallo upgraded  Albemarle  stock to Hold from Sell.  Albemarle stock was up 0.9% in premarket trading, while  and  futures were up 0.2% and 0.1%, respectively.

headline: Albemarle: Risks Mount For Bulls
summary: Albemarle (ALB) was rated a buy, but despite a 60% rebound in lithium prices from June lows, the market faces a persistent supply glut as mine output outpaces EV-driven demand. Read on here.
